Foundations.title: Accessibility
Foundations.abstract: Accessible user interfaces empower everyone to have a great experience with your app or game.

sections.text: Accessibility helps everyone enjoy your software.

sections.heading: Best practices
sections.text: Support dynamic type and sufficient contrast.

Components.title: Buttons
Components.abstract: Buttons initiate actions in your interface.

sections.heading: Usage
sections.text: Use clear labels and accessible hit targets.
